#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int n, k;
	
	cin >> n >> k;
	int a[n];
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		cin >> a[i];
	}
	
	long long low, mid, high;
	low = 0;
	high = 10000000000000000LL;
	long long ans = high;
	while(low <= high) {
		mid = (low+high)>>1;
		long long tot = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			tot += mid/a[i];
		}
		if(tot < k) {
			low = mid+1;
		}
		else {
			ans = min(ans, mid);
			high= mid-1;
		}
	}
	cout << ans << endl;
	return 0;
}
